channel.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Pink
channel.description: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Face Down in the Mud
item.description:
The 'Face Down in the Mud' comes with one Pink watch face and one Orchid strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made from a scratch-..

Price: $45.00
